pashchath gatum awadhiye shri lankawa athkaragena athi sanwardhanaya aashcharyak bawa japana jyeshta rajathanthrika yasushi akashi mahatha prakasha kaleya.shri lankawata wada sampath boho athi samahara sanwardhitha ratawal shri lankawa ha ehi sanwardhanaya pilibandawa noiwasillak pala kirima asadharana bawa pawasu ee mahatha meya sadharana ho wishayaya mulika nowana bawath awadharanaya kaleya.ee mahatha mese prakasha kale janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha janadhipathi mandirayedi eeye (09) udasana hamu wu awasthawediya.ugath padam ha prathisandhana komisame nirdesha kriyathmaka kirime pa්ragathiya, samastha sanhindiya ka්riyadamaya ha shri lankawa ha japanaya athara podu dwiparshwika sabandatha athulu karunu rasak pilibandawa janadhipathithuma saha akashi mahatha mehidi sakachcha kalaha.
dakshayin atharin athi dakshayin soya yana mewara loka kusalana papandu tharagawaliye pranshaya ha beljiyama athara palamu awasan purwa tharagaya rusiyawe santha pitarsbarghidi pawathwini.
